entries.name: Cursor Cloud Agents API - List Agents
entries.title: Cloud Agents API | Cursor Docs

basics.summary: List all Cursor Cloud Agents for the authenticated API key.

endpoint.description: Returns a paginated list of cloud agents associated with the API key.

queryParameters.name: limit
queryParameters.description: Maximum number of agents to return. Default: implementation-specific; respect server limits.

queryParameters.name: cursor
queryParameters.description: Pagination cursor returned from a previous List Agents response.

usageNotes: Use Basic Auth where the API key is the username and the password is empty (i.e. "YOUR_API_KEY:").
Always handle pagination via the returned cursor to avoid missing agents.
Never log raw API keys; store them in environment variables and pass them via headers only.
